samples.question: [Transcript chunk 9]
samples.transcript: People enjoy playing computer games for enjoyment purposes of course course it is a great Pastime I have found usually a lot of people look at video games computer games and there is a stigma that it is a waste of time or that it could in encourage them to do things violently for some reason but actually if you spent a moderate amount of time on computer games I do not think that it can do any harm and also it is a great way for you to have fun with your friends as well well if the game is multiplayer especially if you live far away from your friends and there is no other way for you to spend a significant amount of time to reconnect sorry to connect with them I would say that online multiplayer video games is phenomenal in sustaining your friendship and having a thing for you guys to bond over even though you are not together physically do you think that all computer games should have a minimum age for players I would not say all of them do some of them definitely if they feature violence as I mentioned before those are definitely not appropriate for children to play B but other than that I think if the game the the objective of the game is simple is nothing too inappropriate for example if just a if it is a puzzle game right I do not think there should be age limits to those I would say that it is even encouraged for children to play puzzle games in which they would have to use their problem solving skills yeah it depends on the genre and the content okay thank you so much now let.

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 10]
samples.transcript: Discuss technology in the classroom mhm in what ways can technology in the classroom be helpful being a teacher a tutor myself I think that nowadays the implementation of technology in the classroom is inevitable and is very much helpful for both teachers and students I am just going to take a very simple example like the projector having a way to show your computer screen onto a whiteboard so that the whole class can see what you are doing on the computer is a really great way to illustrate certain aspects of a lesson and also organiz ing activities games for children sorry for students to take part in during class using their phones such as Quizlet or I forgot the name of the other website but yeah it is a great way for students to engage in the lesson and feel like and feel that they want to contribute yeah do you agree that students are often better at using technology than the teachers most of the time if it is a relatively modern kind of device or technology then I would say yes a lot of the times I even myself I I am a young person but some of my younger students know how to navigate certain websites better than I do but other kinds of Technology such as how to use like a class management website or software those definitely are technology that teachers know how to do better than students do you believe that computers will ever replace human teachers I am going to be optimistic and say no as powerful as AI technology has become in recent years I do not think that there will ever be a day when human teachers are.

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 4]
samples.transcript: Beauty do you think beauty is important in our society according to me beauty is not as important as the people think it is because if we have not our internal skills and we do not do the hard work about our task then it is it does not matter how beautiful we are we cannot perform the work the right way so it does not really matter okay and is it good that people give so much importance to beauty no it is not good because beautiful person are not always so good and successful as the others one they can also be successful but the right thing is that they must do hard work and prepare for their job okay can people who are not as attractive can be as successful as beautiful people yes they can be even more successful than the beautiful ones because we can see many examples in india like we can see dr apj abdul kalam who has been on and very on a label post that is the president and moreover he was a great scientist and he had done a lot of hard work in his life so he has proved the statement that beauty is not all the thing that matters okay very nice okay are clothes important to person success no clothes are not important to a person's success because it only defines the status and how much money he has it does not tell us about what qualities he has or what he can do to help us okay okay last question for today are fashion shows really necessary yes according to me fashion shows are really necessary because they give employment to so many people like if we talk about the fashion designers and the models makeup artist they all and such all.

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 2]
samples.transcript: I usually hang out with my friends go to the park or watch movies I also enjoy dancing and listening to music sometimes I like to read books and playing games on my phone how often do you have fun with your friends or your family I try to have fun with my family or friends at least once a week we often go out on weekends to have a good time together whether it is having a picnic or going to the movies or just spending a time at home playing board games do you prefer having fun indoors or outdoors and why I prefer having fun and Outdoors because I love being in nature and enjoying the fresh air activities like hiking picnics or playing sports are more exciting for me however I also like indoor activities like watching movies or playing video games when the weather is not so good do you think people in your country have enough opportunities to have fun yes I think people inpakistan have many opportunities to have fun there are parks Cinemas shopping malls and cultural events that people can enjoy in the city of tashkin the in particular has a lot of recreational activities for both young and older people how has technology changed the way you have fun over the years technology has changed the way I have fun a lot now I can play games online watch movies or TV shows on streaming services and stay connected with my friends through social media it has made it easier to find entertainment and share experience with others even if they are far away if you could choose a new and enjoyable activity what would you like to do if I could choose a new and enjoyable activity I would.

samples.transcript: Been learning some Japanese but I am not yet fluent to overcome this I would continue starting the language and try to immerse myself as much as possible by practicing with native speakers and using language apps another challenge could be adapting to the new cultural norms and lifestyle I would making effort to learn about Japanese customs and etiquette to avoid any misunderstandings and to show respect for the local culture overall moving to Japan is something I really look forward to I believe it will be an amazing experience with careful preparation and an open mind I am confident I can overcome any challenges and make the most of this opportunity okay.

samples.transcript: Check the weather forecast before going out and if there is a sign of rain even if there is a slight sign of rain I would always take my umbrella with me okay great always prepared what do you think are the effects of climate change in recent years I would say the main effect would be the weather not being correct as in during the winter when it should be cold when it should be snowing at a particular time period or season it is snowing a little bit more late or the weather's a little bit more warmer than it should be and during the summer it is Summer's kind of coming more early and the weather's getting more hot m i see and would you like to visit other cities that have different climates from where you live I would definitely want to live or go on a trip to a country that is different from Korea I enjoy cold weather so I think I would enjoy going to countries like Canada or Greenland that has more cooler atmosphere than my home country great all right so that is everything for part one.

samples.question: [Transcript chunk 3]
samples.transcript: He is from the United States I met him at College when I first went to my university and I really thought he was very open-minded he had a more outgoing attitude and a little bit more optimistic than other friends that I had in Korea and because of that personality he helped me get along with the New culture and new atmosphere of us college and I think that was very helpful for me in that case and most of the time his open-minded attitude kind of affected me also so it changed my attitude and my personality as becoming an outgoing person too when when we get along when we hang out with other friends he would also be the one who leads the friend group and since I was kind of a not as much outgoing a little bit not pessimistic pessimistic but calm and quiet friend in that group he would always kind of bring me to a meeting or a party and that would help me get along with other friends which helped me get used to the environment better oh that is great all right so.
